comments:
This danish hypercar is the street legal version of the ZENVO TSR. Entirely hand built, it delivers almost 1200HP for 1495kg.
The TSR-R has a very aggressive look, with no air conditioning, no airbags and no radio. Of course, it features the Zenvo dual-effect spoiler that reinforces the feeling of power.
Zenvo seems to be following Koenigsegg's goal, maybe Zenvo will end up making a name for itself in this field?

Why limited top speed?
Because aero. The aim of the TSR-S is to make the air work harder, do more for you.

Heres Vollertsen again:
The TSR track car had a fixed rear wing, but Id been thinking that maybe we could alter the downforce so we could put more pressure back across to the unloaded inside wheel while cornering, so you not only get downforce, but also create an effect like an anti-roll bar. So we took the standard wing and tried it at different angles in the simulation, and we could see there was a massive impact.

Everyting of this cost 1.45M, acceptable price for it.
